location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Elphinstone, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the Quick and Dead Stocks (not present) up to 30 April 1811, the actual receipts and disbursements (also not present) for the year 1810/11 and the statement of return/import (again, not present) of European goods in the warehouse on 30 April 1811.
